marklogic.body: You know, I thought he lookedÂ a little Off of his game over the past couple of weeks.Â Generally, when he's running full tilt and given a few weeks he's good for at least 10 good petulant insults against one groupÂ of Americans or another, 20 narratives designed to incite envy, hate, resentment, between one ethnic group and another, 10-15 pejoritives discrediting someones vocation, 30 solid lies, 10 golf games, 5 vacations, and 5 white house parties, oh yeah and 50 fund raisers.Â Could be a head Cold.Â Not to worry,nothing like spending millions of taxpayer dollars to get yourself re-elected to get a guy back in the pink.
